reviews_data.review_text: Very clean, friendly staff, and delicious matcha!
Amazing food and beverages. On top of a great atmosphere and plenty to do nearby

The ladies were super friendly! They greeted me the moment I walked in, gave me suggestions on what I was looking for! Very quick with my order, fairly priced for the quality of coffee received! I love a dark, deep, cold brew, and the Nitro Cold Brew hit the spot! The bathrooms are super clean as well, which is always what I look for in a new business! Thanks again!! Loved my coffee!
Descent ambiance, clean. I looked forward to my first visit but was disappointed with the pina colada smoothie, coarse ice, hint of coconut, no pineapple flavor. $6 milk drink down the drain.
Great place to hang with small kids
Great place to stop for a coffee and a snack. Nice selection to choose from. The cookies are delicious!
Very friendly staff, stylish decor, yummy drinks and the play place was clean.
Amazing and so cute
I can't rate the food because I only got a coffee but the service was excellent.
Love!! Super clean, delicious coffee, and super spacious. If I ever want some alone time this is my go-to especially because of the kids play area!
lemon cake? amazing! cold? even better! chai latte with coffee very good! love the atmosphere!

The coffee shop is located inside/adjacent to a church and has a separate entrance. The seating area is very nice, clean, spacious, and has lots of natural light. There is also an open entry point into the church's reception area.
I ordered a bakery item and coffee both of which were good. The wait was a little longer than what would be expected, considering there weren't that many customers.

Love this place! Nice and friendly staff and the coffee and food is good too! The overall area and atmosphere just pits you at easy when you want to get away from the hustle and bustle of a "way too busy" coffee shop norm. Also attached is a play area for kids.
This place is amazing! A coffee shop and indoor playground all in the same place! Why can't this place be everywhere?
I was greeted warmly upon arrival. I had heard rave reviews about their orange/pecan muffins.10/10 would order this again! Specialty coffees are excellent as well.

Seriously, this place is awesome! They absolutely nail my coffee every single time. It's like they read my mind! I'm practically addicted--I swing by at least five times a week now. Forget trying to make coffee at home, it's just not the same anymore! And don't even get me started on their sandwiches... so incredibly tasty! Trust me, you gotta check this spot out if you're into amazing coffee and killer sandwiches!
Great cappuccino. Friendly staff.
Very friendly staff and an evolving menu.
They have the best white chocolate latte I have ever had before, we came back 2 days in a row on our trip! Will definitely be back!

This little coffee shop with an indoor playground is truly amazing. The coffee is fresh and super delicious   The food is amazing. The food is freshly prepared and hot to order.  You won't get overpriced microwaved frozen food like at the other popular coffee chain that begins with the letter "S". I've  tried almost everything! The Loaded Breakfast Wrap, the Turkey Apple Grilled Cheese, the Italian Panini, Bacon Egg Cheese (BEC) Wrap, the Chicken Salad Croissant Bites, Lemon Loaf cake and the many delicious flavors of Macaron cookies. Javesca is immaculate and very spacious with lots of indoor and outdoor seating. The service is impeccable and the wait staff are hard working and quite attentive. And the best part yet... A percentage of their proceeds goes towards funding their many food missions and charities. I rate this place an A++  !  Give this place a try. You'll find yourself coming again and again. And you'll have a warm and fuzzy feeling inside knowing that a percentage of your purchase will be helping those in need as well as supporting a Charlotte business!!  
P.S. -I wasn't able to add captions to the pics so here it is from left to right:
1-Turkey Apple Grilled Cheese with a Mocha Iced Latte.
2 - Italian Panini with Mocha Iced Latte
3 - Lemon Loaf, Cappuccino, Mocha Iced Latte and Italian Panini
4 - Loaded Breakfast Wrap with Mocha Iced Latte
5 -Javesca's  Brochure
We really enjoy this place. Our little one goes to the preschool around the corner and it's nice to grab a coffee and work while she's in her program. The indoor playground is amazing!

Such a cute addition to Steele Creek area!! Having a coffee shop attached to an indoor playground is literally the most amazing idea. Coffee was yummy and my kid had a great time! Everything was clean and nice!

Finally got to try the new Javesca Cafe at CTK Church. Great experience. I had the bacon, egg and cheese wrap and it was delicious. Steven Bollinger helped me decide on my drink and my white chocolate raspberry latte was an excellent choice. Friendly service, strong wifi and enjoyed the background music that was just loud enough to hear but not too loud where you couldn't have a conversation. Comfortable chairs and couches. If I lived locally this would be my place to meet up with friends.

Great coffee. Good food options. Place is well kept, spacious and clean. Kids loved getting some school done and work.
The indoor playground access is a nice addition for the little ones.

Great place for kids, we had our sons birthday here and it was a blast

Also the coffee is great!
Awesome atmosphere.  It's large in space with a cozy atmosphere.  The food is amazing.  Service was top notch.  Not stuffy at all.  Barista Aaron brings a pleasant ambience.

I have mixed feelings about this place. The facility is beautifully designed and clean. The food was great. Unfortunately the service is.... well awkward. The 4 employees there didn't greet us, talk to us, or tell us to have a good day or anything. They just stood there until I prompted them to take my order. Very robot like. So they didn't come off as rude by any means just extremely awkward and did not look happy to be there at all. Nice place, good food, non existent service.
The food was really good, but the frappe coffee wasn't good

Coffee was ok, food wasn't great.  Had the sausage egg and cheese.  It was just two somewhat low quality (including several hard gristle bits) and small sausage patties on a hamburger bun with egg and cheese. My americano was ok, but my wife's latte was 'meh' (bit more 'chemical taste' than normal lattes).  All in all, 4 stars due to service and atmosphere and decent enough coffee but wouldn't order food here again.
Friendly staff and really upscale feel of a coffee shop-turned coworking / multipurpose space.

I was so excited to try this new Javesca location today right around the corner from me! I got their seasonal lavender honey latte and it was absolutely delicious. There was a ton of pastry and food options that I'll definitely try next time. The place was massive and has a ton of potential for the community to use for hanging out, coffee dates, meetings, or just to enjoy some good coffee. Thanks for the perfect morning pick me up
Great new coffee spot with ample seating, and it's connected to the community center so even more to explore. Friendly staff, great coffee, and love the mission and vision of Javesca Coffee.
Amazingly fresh coffee and the food was very delicious and hit the spot. I would absolutely recommend this spot, especially once the season changes and a nice hot coffee outside is needed!

Wow!! I cannot even begin to express how impressed I was with the food, coffee, and overall polite staff. I tried the TBA and it was savory and packed full of flavor. The chai latte was better then my typical Starbucks chai. My fiancee and I are found our new breakfast spot ( *_* )

Best coffee in Steele Creek area! We had cold with hazelnut syrup, and drip coffee. Amazing selection of macarons: had the orange/truffle one, de-li-cious! Will have to try all. Indoor playground is super nice for little ones! Plenty of space to work here or to meet friends!

Spacious, inviting, good selection of food and drinks. Prices are comparable, even a little lower than Starbucks. And, it's the only coffeeshop in the Steele Creek area other than Starbucks. I ordered the Apple Grilled Cheese Panini (highly recommended, btw ) and a white chocolate frap with almond milk. Both VERY good!
I'll be back again!

Came here for the grand opening and loved the food, drinks and atmosphere. Excited for normal hours and to meet up with friends or bring some work here on my own.
I had the nitro brew and chicken salad croissants and both were excellent!
